title: SET_PAUSE_MENU_PED_SLEEP_STATE
content:
0xECF128344E9FF9F10x8F45D327// SetPauseMenuPedSleepState
void SET_PAUSE_MENU_PED_SLEEP_STATE(BOOL state);Parameters:state: 0 will make the ped slowly fall asleep, 1 will slowly wake the ped up.Toggles the pause menu ped sleep state for frontend menus.Example GIF
